info.name: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover]
info.description: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover] will remove the Find Friends content on the left column where you should see the following: Best Friend, Coworkers and Classmates. This new style should also remove the ContextualHelp located on the right column where it some times say: Add a Picture of Yourself or even Welcome to Your Profile Get Inspired: See Friend's Profile. See other things you wish to see off your Facebook page? Just let me know!
info.additionalInfo: Recent Fixes None Instructions 1° Select your current browser below the [+ Install with Stylish] button. 2° Once you selected your preferred browser for the Stylish, press the [+ Install with Stylish] button to install the code to your plug-in. 3° Simply open a new tab to see if it worked. If no changes as been set, go to the [ S ] icon, click it then right-click on Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover] and select Enable Troubleshoot For those who have an issue with this style, please submit a picture with your message for better support. Thank you!
